name: Music_2269.wav
caption: This clip features a drum solo being played. The first beat in the clip is played by striking the hi-hat and kick twice and then the snare once. This pattern is repeated three times followed by a roll. The snare is played four times followed by the toms. This pattern is played twice. This is followed by a pattern where the snare and toms are struck in a sequence of four strokes, five strokes and six strokes all fitting within the counts of the bar. This song is a demo of the percussion instrument being used.
